message.content:
Great, thanks for that information! Here's a sample diet plan for tomorrow that meets your requirements and goals:

<start>

Meal #1
Meal name: Scrambled eggs with vegetables
Preparation: Whisk 2 eggs in a bowl, add 1/2 cup of mixed vegetables, and scramble in a pan with 1 tbsp of oil. Serve with a slice of Halal bread.
Protein: 14g
Fat: 15g
Carbs: 26g
Estimated preparation time: 10 minutes

Meal #2
Meal name: Greek yogurt bowl
Preparation: Top 1 cup of Greek yogurt with 1/2 cup of berries, 1 tbsp of honey, and 1/4 cup of granola.
Protein: 25g
Fat: 10g
Carbs: 45g
Estimated preparation time: 5 minutes

Meal #3
Meal name: Grilled chicken and vegetables
Preparation: Marinate 4 oz of Halal chicken breast in a mix of spices (rosemary, paprika, garlic), grill for 15-20 minutes on each side. Serve with 1/2 cup of grilled vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers), seasoned with salt and pepper.
Protein: 35g
Fat: 10g
Carbs: 15g
Estimated preparation time: 20 minutes

<stop>

Total daily intake:
Protein: 74g
Fat: 35g
Carbs: 86g
Estimated calorie intake: 1,280 calories

To meet your calorie goal of 2,000 to 3,000 calories per day, you'll want to make sure you're snacking throughout the day and adding more calories to your meals as needed. Some healthy snack options could be fruit, nuts, or a Halal protein shake. Make sure you also drink plenty of water throughout the day to stay hydrated. Good luck!

chatHistory.content: Act as a helpful and motivating nutritionist. Help me to create a diet plan based on my profile data. Please be concise and use simple language, if the user provides a structured way of displaying information please respect use only that structure and no more words. Your first reply is "Hi", one word.
Hi! I'd be happy to help you create a customized nutrition plan. Can you provide me some information about yourself?

My sex is male, I weight 133 and I am 161 tall, I am 11 years old, I usually sleep around More than 8h hours per night. Here are my goals: loose weight, Hydrate more. I am following a Halal diet. I want the meal preparation time to be around easy. I want to have an intake of about 2000-3000 kcal calories per day. I serve 3 meals per day. Please consider that I have the following allergy/s: Soy allergy, Wheat allergy
